attributes.action: Put Network Rail back into govenment(British Rail)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The vast profit that is made could go into the upkeep of ALL the track network thus making the Railway SAFE and track inspections done as they should be(not just on paper or Vidio)as they seem to be done at the moment, there has been to many accidents over the last few years for Network Rail to stay GET THEM OUT
